de.geofencing.client.restClient

Class RestDeviceClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.geofencing.client.restClient.RestClient
      • de.geofencing.client.restClient.RestDeviceClient

  • public class RestDeviceClient
extends RestClient
    Provides a client for the restful web service with all functions the the GeofencingDevice.
    Author:
    Markus Thral

      • RestDeviceClient

    • Method Detail

      • registerDevice

        public int registerDevice()
                   throws RestClientException
        Adds Device to the system. The address of the Device has to be set as authorization before this method is called.
        Returns:
        Generated deviceID
        Throws:
        RestClientException - with ErrorCode if a problem occurs

      • updateDevice

        public boolean updateDevice(int deviceID,
                            SystemBeacons beacons)
                     throws RestClientException
        Updates beacons in range of the Device
        Parameters:
        deviceID - DeviceID of the Device
        beacons - Beacons in range of the Device as SystemBeacons object
        Returns:
        true if Device is updated
        Throws:
        RestClientException - with ErrorCode if a problem occurs

      • updateDeviceToken

        public boolean updateDeviceToken(int deviceID,
                                 java.lang.String deviceToken)
                          throws RestClientException
        Updates Firebase token of the Device
        Parameters:
        deviceID - DeviceID of the Device
        deviceToken - Firebase token of the Device
        Returns:
        true if token is updated
        Throws:
        RestClientException - with ErrorCode if a problem occurs
